ARABIC: لَا يَمَسُّهُمْ فِيهَا نَصَبٌ وَمَا هُم مِّنْهَا بِمُخْرَجِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They will not be affected by any tiredness there and they will never be made to leave.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: No weariness will come upon them, nor will they be sent away from there.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They shall face no fatigue in it, nor shall they ever be driven out of it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: No fatigue will touch them nor will they be expelled therefrom."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Neither any hardship is to reach them in it, nor are they to be expelled from it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: No sense of fatigue shall touch them, nor shall they be asked to leave it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Toil shall not afflict them in it, nor shall they be ever ejected from it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: no fatigue there shall smite them, neither shall they ever be driven forth from there.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Toil cometh not unto them there, nor will they be expelled from thence.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They will not be affected by any weariness there, and they will never be made to leave."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: There shall touch them no toil therein, nor therefrom they shall ever be driven out.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Therein neither weariness shall touch them, nor will they [ever] be expelled from it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: There no sense of fatigue shall touch them, nor shall they (ever) be asked to leave.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: No sense of fatigue shall touch them, nor shall they (ever) be asked to leave it."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: There, no fatigue shall smite them, nor shall they ever be driven from it'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: No fatigue will ever touch them therein, nor will they be asked to leave it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: No fatigue will touch them therein, nor from it will they [ever] be removed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [15:48] No toil, [no] weariness, will touch them, nor will they be expelled from thence, ever.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Toil) tiredness or hardship (cometh not unto them there) in Paradise, (nor will they be expelled from 276 thence) expelled from Paradise.
